name: Cactus Grower 3000
description:
A simple game made for Low Effort Jam 6. Made in under 12 hours.

You are a cactus. Collect drops of water to grow and keep your Quench up. 

CONTROLS:

A / D - Move left/right

Shift - Move faster (drains Quench faster)

CREDITS:

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/desert-zone-0

Sound effect: https://opengameart.org/content/bubble-pop

Font: https://www.dafont.com/hand-drawn-shapes.font?l[]=10&l[]=1
